title: Introducing secret
description: send a message through a safe, private, and encrypted link that automatically expires to ensure your stuff does not remain online forever.

title: Part III: How to create a node module
description: Let’s learn how to create a small and simple node module with some ES2015 features and more. This is part 3 where I will cover tests, continuous integration and publishing a node module.

title: Part II: How to create a node module
description: Let’s learn how to create a small and simple node module with some ES2015 features and more. This is part 2 where we code all parts to make it possible to make the pizza.

title: Part I: How to create a node module
description: Let's learn how to create a small and simple node module with some ES2015 features and more by making a pizza

title: Behind The Product: Goot humanize greetings
description: Introducing `goot` — A nodejs module to help humanize greetings in different languages.

title: Twitter: “edit tweet“ concept
description: We can build skyscrapers hundreds and hundreds of stories tall and thousands of feet tall with elevators that just shoot to the top in a matter of a minute or two but we can't edit out tweets.
